gold.user: User requests their account details to verify information.
gold.ideal: Returns the account details including ID, type, and status.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all accounts they manage.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of accounts with their respective details.

gold.user: User wants to view details of a specific account.
gold.ideal: Returns detailed information about the specified account.

gold.user: User adds a new bank account to their account.
gold.ideal: Returns the newly created bank account details.

gold.user: User wants to see all external accounts linked to their account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of external accounts associated with the account.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all charges made.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of charges with details such as amount and status.

gold.user: User wants to view details of a specific charge.
gold.ideal: Returns detailed information about the specified charge.

gold.user: User creates a new customer profile.
gold.ideal: Returns the newly created customer details.

gold.user: User wants to view details of a specific customer.
gold.ideal: Returns detailed information about the specified customer.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all invoices.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of invoices with their respective details.

gold.user: User wants to view details of a specific invoice.
gold.ideal: Returns detailed information about the specified invoice.
